Musubi gently pushed her Ashikabi down to the couch, leaning in and meeting his lips with hers. The young girl's enourmous b*** squished against Minato's chest and pressed up warmly around his neck.
Minato thought Musubi felt heavy on top of him and he wondered if she weighed more than him or if he was just out of shape. …Well, he's out of shape now, but, before, he might have been out of shape too…oh, forget it.

Minato wrapped his fluffier arms around his new girlfriend and held her closer, squishing her big, warm b*** against him more. Musubi adjusted herself, bringing herself higher and began grinding herself against Minato's big, full belly.

He could feel her delicate hands kneading his soft flesh. It was still a shock to him, how his body had changed. He struggled to believe that all of this was really him now. Yet, under Musubi's delicate ministrations, it didn't seem so bad. Here, in this moment, it didn't seem so bad.

It was very strange to Minato to watch and feel as Musubi rubbed her crotch against his stuffed belly. She seemed to be enjoying it, though, so he supposed he wouldn't stop her from doing something that pleased her. But he began to wonder, if she enjoyed doing this, maybe he could do some things with her as well.

"H-Hey Musubi?"

"Hnn, Minato-sama." Musubi mewled, eyes close as she continued to rub herself on her Ashikabi's packed tummy.

"Can I...May I maybe...you don't have to say yes to this, you can say no if you want, please feel your b***?"

"Hnn, oh, yes. Please feel them, Minato-sama. Musubi loves it when she or other people feel and squeeze her b***."

Minato can't believe his ears. How is this possible? How could a guy like him end up with a girl like this? Fortunately, his instincts were able to take over while his mind was frozen in shock. He slowly and hesitantly raised his hands, approaching Musubi's magnificent chest inch by inch.

When his hands finally made contact, his mind seemed to shatter further. 'Soft', was all he could think through the euphoric haze.

"My turn now!" Musubi said, breaking Minato out of his haze as her hands grasped his own torso. "Minato-sama's b*** are a lot smaller than Musubi's", she observed with a giggle.

Meanwhile Minato was too shocked to say anything as Musubi slowly and gently began to massage his chest. "But Musubi can tell Minato-sama has a lot of potential."

"And this best part is, Musubi knows that tomorrow will be even better. Because Musubi will get to ... spend it with ... Minato ... sama."

But Musubi's only response was to quietly rub her face against Minato's chest, her other arm snaked around his back, holding to two together.

1413111221.content:
Minato was having a difficult evening. Even while carrying him, Musubi was very fast. So even though he quickly figured out that Musubi had no idea where she was going, they’d already covered a fair bit of distance.

Normally it wouldn’t be a big deal. But then, Minato was normally a hundred pounds lighter and wearing clothes that were rather loose. Now however he was trying to make his way home while carrying the extra weight, and dealing with the fact that some of his clothes looked almost painted on. He was just happy he recognized where they were and knew how to return to his apartment, even though it would take him longer.

Musubi noticed her Ashikabi’s slow and awkward walk. “Would you like me to carry you again, Minato-sama?”

Between his uncomfortable attire, slow pace, and the gnawing, empty feeling within his belly, Minato was tempted for a moment. But his newly developing fear of heights and of getting truly lost stopped him.

“That’s okay Musubi, I’m in the mood for a good walk,” Minato politely declined. But between running from those lightning twins and now carrying this extra weight, Minato was feeling a little tired, but he didn’t tell Musubi, not wanting to concern her.

“Hey, Musubi, you feel like taking a detour through the park?” Minato hoped she’d say yes. There’d be plenty of benches in the park where he could rest, claiming he’d like to enjoy the scenery and fresh air, rather than admitting he could use a break and looking like a wimp in front of Musubi.

“Sure Minato,” Musubi was quick to agree with her usual enthusiasm and cheerful expression. Minato breathed a silent sigh of relief.

When he came to the first bench in the park, an expression of concern appeared on his face as he forgot all about taking his short rest.
------
She was broken. She was a failure. She was unnecessary and unwanted, with nowhere to go and no one to turn to.

Akitsu stared at nothing, gazing listlessly ahead. She faintly noted the people passing by the park bench where she sat. They simply passed her by, only noticing her to go a few more steps around her before continuing on their way. And why should they care about her, they all had people who wanted them, while she was nothing but a scrap number.

“Excuse me Miss, are you all right?” The question broke her from her thoughts and left her stunned for a moment. ‘They couldn’t mean me, could they?’ Slowly she turned and discovered someone was sitting beside her.

He was a young man with black messy hair, with a gentle smile on his face. As she took more in, she noticed the straight of his clothes. They were far too tight, and probably uncomfortably so. His plain grey shirt rode up, exposing a noticeably round belly. It wasn’t too big, but it also made his tight jeans impossible to button and forced the zipper all the way down.

She noticed another looking over the boy’s shoulder. It was a well endowed girl with brown hair that matched her brown eyes. She wore a rather eccentric outfit that seemed like almost like what a shrine maiden would wear. Akitsu knew she was a Sekirei immediately. ‘Then that would make him her Ashikabi,’ she noted, returning her full attention to the male beside her.

Which made this all the more puzzling. Why would he talk to a scrap like her when he already had a perfectly good Sekirei? Her thoughts again broke off as the man addressed her again.

“You seem like something’s wrong. Is there anything I can do to help?” He asked with a concerned tone. “Do you want me to call someone for you?”

Akitsu didn’t know how to respond at first. No one had ever shown concern for her like this before. She felt a small warmth bloom in her chest for a moment before she answered. “No. I have nowhere to go.”

His eyes widened. “Is there anything I can do?” further worry was evident in his voice. Akitsu again found herself unsure of how to respond. Then his eyes moved to her exposed forehead and faint recognition showed. “Are you a Sekirei?” he asked uncertainly.

“She should be, Minato-sama,” a cheerful voice cut in. It was the Sekirei she had noticed earlier. ‘So, his name is Minato,’ she faintly noted. She continued. “That’s the Sekirei mark on her forehead, though I’m not sure why it’s there.” The girl cocked her head to one side as she admitted her confusion.

“It is because I am a scrapped number. This mark is proof that I am a failure and will never have an Ashikabi. Thus I am worthless and unwanted.” She turned her gaze back to the ground in front of her as she said this.

“Well, I don’t think you’re worthless,” Akitsu turned to him with faint disbelief. “And if you want, you could come with us if you want.” Then his eyes widened and he spoke again, now in a panicked voice. “Not that I’m trying to make you come with me, if you don’t want to.” He waved his arms in front of him a bit, as though to ward off misconceptions.

Akitsu felt the warm return again as she gazed at him. “What is your name?”

“Oh, sorry, I never did introduce myself.” He responded with a more calm tone, though he still seemed nervous as he scratched the back of his head with one hand. “I’m Minato Sahashi and this is Musubi,” he gestured to the girl behind him, who beamed happily as she gave an enthusiastic wave.

But Akitsu’s eyes never left Minato. “And you would take care of me? You’d want me, even though I cannot bear your mark or leave my own mark upon your figure? You’d still be my Ashikabi?”

A blush spread across Minato’s face. “Well, I don’t know how good of an Ashikabi I’ll make, but I promise I’ll try to be the best I can be.” He looked down as he finished, too shy to meet her gaze.

When he did look up, he found that Akitsu had moved much closer to him. “Then I, Akitsu, will be yours, now and forever, my Ashikabi.” She leaned in and their lips meet.

It was just a chaste kiss, without any light show or changes to his own body like with Musubi, but Minato found himself no less stunned.

When the kiss ended, he and Akitsu found themselves both embraced by Musubi. “Yay! You found us a new friend, Minato-sama!” She cheered with her arms wrapped around them.

Akitsu remained stoic as Minato replied, “I guess I did.”

14131112211.content:
"Well, here we are. I know it's not really much, bit it's home." Minato said to his two companions.

After Akitsu joined their group, the three continued on their way back to Minato's apartment, on foot this time. Thankfully the late hour meant that the streets we're that busy and those who were out and about were familiar with the nightlife and had seen stranger than the three.

Minato had spent the entire trip anxious, sneaking occasional glances at Musubi and Akitsu. He still had no idea what was going. What was a Sekirei? And what's an Ashikabi? And yet somehow, he'd apparently found himself as the Ashikabi of two Sekirei. What has he supposed to do? All he could hope was that the two of the them would be able to explain some things to him.

'Well, maybe just Akitsu could explain things,' Minato amended, glancing over at Musubi who continued to cheerfully ramble on and on about nothing in particular as she had for their entire journey. It's not as though it was annoying or anything, in fact Minato rather enjoyed the cheerful chatter. However, Musubi's chatter did reveal a certain absentmindedness and an inability to focus.

Akitsu on the other hand, remained silent, following barely a step behind him. Every time he looked back her eyes were fixed solely on him, a blank expression on her face. Having only known her for a limited time, Minato couldn't even begin to guess what was on her mind. Certainly it made for a stark contrast with Musubi, whose constant random commentary made her an open book. He just hoped that she wasn't reconsidering or regretting her decision to have him as her Ashikabi.

Musubi spent some time gazing around the apartment, a look of child-like curiousity of her pretty face.

She turned back to Minato, and Akitsu behind him and said, "It will be so wonderful living here with Minato-sama!" the kuma cutie said ecstatically, her pretty, smiling face beaming happiness.

But then her absentmindedness shone through again as she put a finger to her chin cutely. "But Musubi's room at MBI was much bigger than this." Musubi muttered to herself, oblivious of her Ashikabi's sweat drop.

"Well, I'm on a bit of a budget, with school and all. Still, it's enough." Minato tried to defend his modest dwelling. 'Or it was when it was just me.' He thought to himself, it would be more than a bit of a tight squeeze for three people. Then what Musubi had said fully sank in. "Wait, MBI, the pharmaceutical company? Are they involved in this?"

The Director sat behind his desk. His chubby face was adorned with white spiky hair and a pair of glasses which always seemed to reflect the light and conceal his eyes. His matching white suit and cape did nothing to mask his round shape. His suit had been tailored to comfortably cover his substantial gut and widened hips.

Karasuba stood in front of his desk. She wore her traditional uniform, with a black leather top, and a matching miniskirt and stockings. Her grey haori matchered her ponytail as it hung loosely off her shoulders with the Sekirei symbol emblazed across the back. She stood there bored as she regarded the Director with her narrow eyes.

Minaka began, “You know Karasuba, I’ve been thinking. And I’ve decided upon a way to make the Sekirei Plan a bit more interesting. Of course you know that you are the leader of the Discipline Squad. And we both know that acquiring an Ashikabi will do nothing to change that. In which case, why should it matter who your Ashikabi is? So, I’ve decided to allow you to select your own Ashikabi.”

“Was that all Director?” Karasuba replied disinterested.

“Yep, now hurry along and get your wings. I can’t wait to see who you choose.” Minaka’s grin grew wider as he dismissed her.

Karasuba left without a word. Honestly, the whole thing seemed like a huge waste of time. She couldn’t care less about who her Ashikabi was, and she’d much rather just be assigned one and get it over with than go out and actually look for one. ‘And now I have to shift through the masses of vermin to find one I can actually use.’

She stopped in front of the elevator. It opened to reveal the head researcher, Takami.

Takami’s short grey hair matched her eyes as it framed her chubby face with its extra chin. She wore a white shirt with a black tie underneath a lab coat. Though the material used to make the lab coat was enough to form a bed sheet. Her basketball sized breasts rested heavily upon her flabby gut. Her hips flared out to approximately four feet in width. Her black pants looked to be stretched to the limit as they struggled to contain her, flared hips, tree trunk thighs, and beach ball sized butt. One hand held a clipboard while the other held a half eaten donut. The two didn’t even bother to acknowledge each other as they passed.

But as she entered the elevator, a thought occurred to her as she recalled a conversation she’d overheard between the Director and head researcher. ‘They had a son, one who is living here in the capital, don’t they? Given his parents, he’s sure to be an Ashikabi. And didn’t Takami swear to Minaka she’d never allow him to be caught up in the Sekirei Plan?’ As the elevator doors closed, a sinister smile formed on Karasuba’s face. ‘Perhaps I should pay him a visit.’

155332222121.title: Minato's Cooking

choices: "Wow, you're pretty thin...Wonder how long that'll last?"
1553322221211.content:
Well, this is it, Minato thought as he continued packing things into the spacious cardboard box. I’m finally moving away from this apartment.

Honestly, Minato was incredibly relieved. No longer would he have to put up with that terrible landlord. No longer would he have to deal with cold neighbors. No longer would he be feeling that terrible draft that always seemed to be near his bed. He was leaving, and hopefully, he’d never have to look back.

Granted, he had actually been kicked out, so he didn’t have much choice in the matter, but he was still going away, and that’s what mattered. He was graciously accepted into Maison Izumo, and he definitely wasn’t going to squander this chance. After all, it wasn’t even like he was looking out for himself anymore. There was also…

“Hey, bro!”

A voice from the doorway cut Minato out of his thoughts, as he turned to see his little sister standing there, smiles as always. Although, saying she was his little sister could really only be applied to their ages, because she was definitely much bigger than him in size.

Weighing in at 324 lbs., Yukari was definitely morbidly obese. She had a giant gut that formed an overhang over the waistband of her skirt, trying as hard as possible to rip out of her constricting white shirt. If one looked closely, there were already several seams and tears created from the young woman’s gut pressing against it a bit too hard. It was all one mass, with no real rolls separating it into different tears. Of course, the young Japanese woman had generous love handles and a spare tire to make up for all that, though.

Her cleavage was also quite massive, each boob nearly the size of medicine balls, and were just as tight against her shirt as her stomach. It was a good thing she never neglected to wear a bra, otherwise her nipples would definitely be easily seen through the fabric. Her tie was situated neatly between them, barely visible through all the flesh surrounding it.

Yukari’s thighs and legs were also very fat-laden. She was almost a couple feet wide, with all the fat caking her thighs jiggling and wobbling anytime she sat down. Her legs were also very thick, both touching each other pretty much all the time due to their circumferences. It led to Yukari complaining about chaffing quite often.

Of course, one couldn’t neglect her ass, which was yet another huge feature of her body. It was pushing against the backside of her skirt to such an extent it was nearly indecent, and it jiggled and wobbled enough to draw attention anytime the brunette was even so much as walking, let alone if she was doing something actually physical.

Finally, there was Yukari’s face, which had also accumulated a lot of fat. Her cheeks were large and puffy, and she had a distinct double-chin that met up with some of her neck fat. It wasn’t a ton, but it was obvious her weight wouldn’t leave her face alone.

What was truly amazing, though, was that Yukari wasn’t always like this. She actually used to be quite slim in the past. However, there was a very good reason as to why she had ballooned so much, and said reason could be found in any kitchen Minato worked in.

Minato was an excellent cook. It was a passion of his practically throughout his entire life, earning compliments from just about anyone that tried his dishes. And of course, since up until relatively recently he had been living with mother and sister his whole life, they were the ones that got to try them the most.

As a result, both his mother, Takane, and his sister, Yukari, gained quite a lot of weight over the years, losing their thin physiques and instead gaining the obese forms they had now. And since Minato created things in big portions, even without his cooking around, they still ate a ton, which helped to (unintentionally) maintain their obese forms.

“Oh, Yukari! What’re you doing here?” Minato asked in surprise.

“What do you mean, ‘what am I doing here’? You were the one who asked me to bring some of my spare clothes for your friend,” Yukari said, sighing a little at her brother’s forgetfulness. “They’re right here in this bag.”

She held up the paper bag she had brought with the clothes inside, dumping it at Minato’s side as she looked around his former apartment.

“Oh, thank you, Yukari. That was really nice, and I’m sorry I made that request out of the blue,” Minato said, giving a nervous chuckle. “Hope I didn’t bring you too out of the way from wherever you were before.”

“Nah, it wasn’t a big deal,” Yukari said off-handedly, plopping down on the couch (and ignoring the protesting of the springs within). “So, where is this friend of yours, anyways? Or am I right in assuming you just wanted to be a pervert and use my clothes for some sexual fantasies?”

“What? N-no! That’s not what I want at all! Come on, Yukari, you know I’m not like that.” Scratching the back of his head, Minato explained, “Well, right now she’s in the back room.”

As if on cue, Minato’s friend came out just as he finished saying that, said friend being Musubi. The brunette was garbed in her traditional miko gear, and was currently carrying a box filled with books to help Minato out. She was very lithe, having several nice curves with a toned butt and flat stomach, but this was made up for by her incredibly large bust. Her face was very thin and nearly angelic, and her arms and legs were smooth and strong.

Upon seeing Minato’s sister, she put on a warm smile.

“Oh, Minato, you didn’t tell me we’d be getting visitors today,” the Sekirei said amicably.

“Well, I kinda… forgot, to be honest,” Minato said embarrassedly. “Yukari, this is Musubi. Musubi, this is Yukari. She’s my younger sister.”

“It’s very nice to meet you, Yukari,” Musubi said enthusiastically. “It’s very nice meeting a friend of Minato’s!”

At first, Yukari was actually genuinely surprised this knock-out of a young woman was actually in her brother’s apartment. But then she said…
1553322221211.title: Large Yukari

choices: "Give me a good ol' belly rub!"
15533222212112.content:
“It’s very nice to meet you, Musubi,” Yukari said amicably, getting up and giving a short little bow to Minato’s friend. She obviously couldn’t go too far down, for fear of potentially causing yet another rip in her shirt or, even worse, pants.

I must say, I can easily see a resemblance between you and Minato,” Musubi said, giving a little giggle. “You’re very lucky to have someone like him as your older brother.”
“Yeah, he can be a handful sometimes, though,” Yukari said with a sly grin over in Minato’s direction.

Then, realizing something, Yukari stole a quick glance over Musubi’s figure.

“Oh, darn. Minato, you should’ve told me what size clothes to bring...”

“Huh? Why’s tha-oh.” Minato said, realizing why his sister said that.

Yukari had brought a bunch of clothes that were at least in the XXL category, which would make them look like cloaks on someone as lithe as Musubi. Obviously, she had expected Minato’s friend to be nearly as overweight as she was, since Minato had neglected to mention a size. The young man mentally slapped himself over such a stupid mistake.

“Well, don’t worry! I think those clothes look really cute,” Musubi said, looking at the uniform that was in the bag as Minato pulled it out and examined it. “You have really good taste, Yukari!”

“Thanks, Musubi, but that’s not the problem here,” Yukari said with a little chuckle. “They’re too big for you...but wait, you already have clothes on.”

“Oh yeah, she does,” Minato contributed. “We were able to get them last night.”

He then heard heavy footsteps coming in direction, and turning around, first he saw just a pair of thick legs. Then, looking up, even though her huge stomach and chest blocked the view somewhat he could barely make out Yukari’s very annoyed face.

“Oh? And you neglected to tell me this, bro? After I came all this way, and taxed my body so much, it turns out it was all for nothing!” Yukari said, sighing exasperatedly. “Oh, just what am I going to do with you?”

“Well, sorry, Yukari. But I thought you said it wasn’t a big deal?” Minato asked sheepishly.

“Well, I said that because I thought all my hard effort was actually going to a good cause! But now I know it was all pointless,” Yukari said, sticking her tongue out at her older sibling.

However, she immediately followed up with one of her normal grins as she plopped back down on the couch, the springs creaking once more.

“Although, you could make it up to me by…”
15533222212112.title: A Warm Greeting, But There's a Problem...

choices: Make a meal for Musubi now
Wait until they get back to Maison Izumo
155332222121121.content:
“You could make one of those really nice American dishes!” Yukari said, clapping her hands together with a devilish smirk on her face.

“Huh?” Minato asked dumbly, before putting a finger to his chin. “Um, okay. Which one would you want in particular?”

“Hmmm…” Yukari said, leaning back as she looked up at the ceiling. “How about… three cheeseburgers, a couple dozen fries, eight chicken tenders, two pizzas, and a large milkshake?”

“Okay, tha-wait, what?!” Minato asked, flabbergasted. “You want me to make all that now?”

“Yeah, why not? You can still use the kitchen, right?” Yukari asked with a faux-innocent tone of voice.

“Not really, no. I don’t have any of those ingredients on hand, first of all, and even if I did, I don’t technically own this apartment anymore. The landlord would have a fit if I started cooking.”

“Aww, that’s a bummer…” Yukari said, looking wistfully off to the side. “Well, guess I should stop over at that new all-you-can-eat American buffet downtown, huh?”

“Yukari, I don’t exactly think that’d be the wisest of decisions…” Minato said, looking at his sister’s huge gut rise and fall with her breathing.

“Oh? And why not?” she asked, knowing full-well what Minato was implying.

Thankfully, Musubi was able to interrupt through a gasp of wonder.

“Wow, Yukari! I had no idea you could eat so much,” the Sekrei said, eyes glistening. “I may’ve very well found a kindred spirit!”

“Huh? You like to eat a lot, too?” Yukari said, quite surprised that such a statement could from someone so slender. “What types of meals do you like?”

“Well, Minato brought me to this really nice restaurant the other day, and there was shrimp tempura, vegetable sushi, udon noodles…”

“What? Minato, you haven’t made any of your really awesome dishes yet?” Yukari asked, shooting Minato a glare, crossing her arms. “And here I thought you’d treat fair maidens better.”

“Wait, now hold on! I didn’t have access to any of my cooking supplies, we were in the middle of the city. I couldn’t just whip something up right then and there on the spot!”

“You really seem to like Minato’s cooking, Yukari,” Musubi said. “Is it really that good?”

“Is it that good? It’s fantastic! Once you’ve tried one of his dishes, Musubi, everything else’ll look pathetic in comparison. All that stuff you mentioned will never fill you up ever again.”

“Ooohh…” Musubi said, eyes once again gaining a sort of wonderment about them.

Minato could only roll his eyes.

“Ugh, there she goes again, making my dishes out to be the best things like sliced bread,” he mumbled to himself. “Great, now Musubi’s expectations are gonna go through the roof!”

Suddenly, Musubi got up from the couch with a bit of a grunt from the exertion. However, after a moment, she was able to get onto her feet, her body jiggling profusely from the vibrations.

“Well, I think I’ll let you two love birds talk with each other a bit more in private.” Turning to Musubi, she continued, “And remember, Musubi, don’t let my brother here worm his way out of making one of his delicious meals for you. You haven’t lived until you’ve tried one of ‘em.”

Making her way to the door, Yukari called back, “Well, see ya later, bro!”

With these parting words, Minato’s jiggly sister left the apartment.

“Aw man, that could’ve gone better…” Minato sighed.

Of course, he hadn’t expected his sister to act any different than usual, but really, that was all a bit exhausting. Looking back at his friend, the young man could tell she was reflecting upon what Yukari said.

Noticing him gazing at her, Musubi put on one of her smiles as she looked at him expectantly.

“So, Minato, are you going to make something really good once we get back to Maison Izumo?” Musbui asked expectantly. “Yukari certainly made it sound like you’ve got quite the repertoire of recipes under your belt.”

After another second, right before Minato was about to respond, Musbui hit her palm as an idea came to her head.

“Hey, wait a minute! I’ve got an idea. You know how when we were accepted into Maison Izumi, you wanted to ‘be of some use’, as you said to Miss Miya?”

Minato raised his eyebrows inquisitively. “Yeah.”

“Well, what if you cook tonight’s dinner for her? Then you’d have a job around the inn, and we could be contributing something positive to it,” Musubi finished, a giant smile on her face.

For a moment, Minato simply looked the other way, twiddling his thumbs. Then, he looked back at Musubi, a defeated expression on his face.

“Okay, I suppose that does sound like a good idea,” he said, somewhat dejectedly. “But I don’t know, Musubi. Miss Miya certainly seems to enjoy cooking, so I don’t wanna just uproot her from something she likes. And besides, what if I’m not that good?”

“Hm?” Musubi cocked her head to the side. “What do you mean by that?”

“You see, I’ve mainly cooked for my mother and sister my whole life, and while they’ve loved it, I’ve never cooked for a bunch of acquaintances before. What if they don’t like it?”

“But Minato, I thought you wanted to go to a Culinary Arts school, right? I mean, you must have some faith in your abilities if you want to go to a place specifically designed to hone your cooking skills exclusively. And besides, if you’re that unconfident about all this, you could make a dish for me right here and see how I like it.” Giving a big smile, Musubi asked, “What do you think?”

Minato looked at her with a mixture of envy and gratitude. Envy, for just how confident she could be compared to him, and gratitutde, for being willing to support him.

Thinking it over a bit more, Minato decided…
155332222121121.title: Minato's Nervousness

choices: Cut to when Minato has befriended all his Sekireis, and they're all eating
Cut to a few days from then
1553322221211212.content:
“Actually, Musubi, before we do anything, I think we should get back to Maison Izumi first and see if this whole idea gets accepted at all, you know?” Minato suggested, grinning sheepishly. “And besides, if the landlord sees me using the utilities around here when I’m not supposed to, we’ll be feeling our ears ring all night long.”

“Hmm, you do have a point,” Musubi said, placing a hand on her chin before smiling in anticipation. “But don’t worry, Minato, I’m sure they’ll give you a shot!”

“Thanks for the vote of confidence,” the young man said as he got back to packing.

+++

“Oh my, that’s very thoughtful of you, Minato,” Miya Asama said, a warm smile on her face. “I’m glad you want to take an active role here in Maison Izumo! And in such a direct manner, too.”

“Sorry if it sounds presumptuous, but I think I could really help you out!” Minato said eagerly. “I mean, think of it this way! If someone takes care of the cooking, you’ll have plenty of leisure time to do whatever you feel like doing. I mean, I don’t know if my stuff will be as good as yours, but I’d like to please request permission to cook tonight’s dinner.”

“Oh, don’t worry, Minato, that’s not presumptuous at all. I’d be glad to let you show off your cooking skills,” Miya said amicably. “After all, if you want to get into the culinary arts, you need to practice, right? And since your apartment doesn’t have any kitchen facilities within, you need to use the main kitchen, anyways.”

“Wow! Thank you, Miss Miya!” Musubi exclaimed, jumping up in excitement. “Ooooh, I can’t wait to try Minato’s cooking!”

“Eh he he, thanks, guys!” the young man said, scratching the back of his head. “Thank you so much!”

“Oh-ho, what’s this I hear about a new type of meal?” Uzume asked as she and Homura entered the foyer. “And if my ears aren’t deceiving me, Minato’s making it, huh?”

“Yep! He wants to enter culinary arts school!” Musubi proclaimed.

“Heh, that’s interesting. You never really struck me as a chef, but I guess everyone hides some secrets,” Homura said, taking a sip from a glass of water on a nearby counter. “I guess we’re in good hands?”

“Yep! Don’t worry, everyone, you can count on me!” Minato said confidently.

+++

A couple hours later saw all the residents of Maison Izumo (barring one bespectacled exception) seated around the main dining table, eagerly anticipating Minato’s meal. They were eating a little later than normal, if only because Minato needed to get used to the kitchen, and not only that, but apparently he was making a whole ton of dishes. When the young man went over all the (mostly foreign) dishes he was planning on making, at first, Miya was quite surprised, but she ended up giving her approval, since anything that wasn’t finished could of course be saved as leftovers.

In the kitchen, however, an atmosphere of anxiety was surrounding Minato, quite the contrast to the atmosphere out in the dining room. Even though the young man put on a brave front before, now his nerves were overstimulated beyond comfort. He really did have no idea how the potentially harsher views of strangers/acquaintances would compare to his family’s opinions. Of course, one could easily see just how much Minato’s family loved his cooking, literally, but who knew how things would go now?

Wait, what the hell am I doing? I can’t get cold feet now! Minato thought, shaking his head. It’s not like I’m giving a speech in front of the entire country, or something. I mean, in the end, if they don’t like my food, I can still help out with cleaning, weeding, and other chores. Then I can get a job, and then boom, rent paid!

A few minutes later, the Ashikabi exited the kitchen, bringing out a few plates at a time with him, popping in and out to get more. The types of cuisines were quite varied in scope and geographic origin, from English, French, Italian, Indian, Japanese, and American. There was mashed potatoes, spaghetti and meatballs, sushi, fried chicken, bloomin’ onion, fried udon, garlic bread, curry, samosas, and all sorts of other amazing meals giving off heavenly aromas.

All the scents filling the air as the food came out was truly making practically everyone’s mouth water in anticipation, several stomachs audibly growling. Once the final plate was brought out, Musubi clapped her hands in glee.

“Wow, Minato! This all looks amazing!” she exclaimed, rubbing her belly. “I can’t wait to give it a try!”

After giving a short bow, everyone dug into Minato’s dishes, and almost immediately, moans of joy filled the room, followed by a quickened pace of bites for all involved. Most people present went for the especially fried and greasy dishes, savoring the crunchiness and blast of flavor contained within.

“Wow, this is amazing!” Miya said enthusiastically, taking a large bite out of the one-pound cheeseburger she was currently holding. “No wonder you have your sights set on culinary arts!”

“Yeah, you can say that again!” Uzume said, chomping down into her chicken-fried steak. “I want Minato to cook for us every night, now!”

“Yes, it truly is something else,” Homura chimed in, gulping up some miso soup. “You’ve really got a gift for this, you know that?”

“Wow, Yukari wasn’t kidding about the quality of your cooking!” Musubi exclaimed ecstatically, eating more spaghetti and meatballs. “This really is some of the best food I’ve ever had!”

“Wow, r-really?” Minato asked, somewhat shocked he was getting all these favorable responses. “It’s actually that good?”

When everyone nodded their heads in agreement, the young man sighed in relief. It turned out he was worrying about nothing, after all, to the point where he was practically being appointed as new chef of Maison Izumo! It really was quite something to wrap his head around, but Minato had a feeling a very fulfilling future was waiting ahead.
1553322221211212.title: A Smash Hit!

15533222212112121.content:
“UURRRP!” Musubi belched in a rather unladylike manner, putting a hand up to her mouth as she gave her stomach a pat. “Eheheh! Excuse me!”

“Ugh, Musubi! Manners,” Tsukiumi said, giving out a huff as she folded her arms underneath her generous cleavage. “Honestly, what is it with thy cavalier attitude nowadays with that?”

“I’m sorry, Tsukiumi, but I just ate a whole bunch of Minato’s buttered clams,” Musubi said, gently rubbing her belly. A lazy smile adorned her face. “I’m only showing how much I like it.”

“Oh-ho! But Musubi, do you honestly think any of us need to verbalize it like that?” Kazehana asked with a wide grin parting her chubby cheeks. “After all, I think our figures alone prove how much we love Minato’s dishes.”

“Really, it’s nothing to be surprised about,” Matsu said as she shifted her sizable bulk, causing her chest and belly to bounce in tandem. “I mean, after all, this is Minato we’re talking about here.”

Tsukiumi could only huff in response, begrudgingly acknowledging the Wind Sekirei’s statement, along with that of the redheaded bespectacled woman. Because yes, it was true: if one looked all around, pretty much almost every single person in Maison Izumo had become bona-fide obese, with the exception of Minato himself and Kuu.

First up, there was Musubi, who had probably seen the biggest gain of them all, weighing in at 446 lbs., and was showing no signs of stopping anytime soon. First, there was her belly, which was one giant ball of flab that hung down over her waist, forming giant love handles on each side. It jiggled and jostled with practically every movement she took, with all the muscle that previously occupied the area having dissolved into warm, cushioned fat.

Her ass was nearly as big, each cheek bobbing and jiggling with the maiden’s motions with every tantalizing movement. Her posterior took up any chair she sat in, and with smaller ones, sometimes it needed a couple in order to be supported. This shelf of an ass was also accompanied by huge thighs that trailed off into chunky legs, which were so cushioned with fat they were perpetually pressed together and chafing anytime the formerly-slender Sekirei walked.

When it came to Musubi’s chest, she had one of the biggest around, which was certainly no small feat in a place with as many morbidly obese women as Maison Izumo. Each melon was filled with massive amounts of both fat and milk, straining against the (much larger version of) the brunette’s miko dress with all their might. They rested on top of her belly quite comfortably, and had even retained a fair amount of perkiness, even though Musbui was certainly much larger than before.

Her face had also seen some change, going from slender and sharp to fat and soft. Her jowls were pronounced, with a noticeable double chin complimented by incredibly chubby cheeks. Her puffy cheeks would even form dimples anytime the Sekirei would smile, and were big enough to slant her eyes just a bit from all the fat pressing up against them. She certainly hadn’t lost any of her natural beauty, it was just of a different sort compared to the past.

If one looked around, the other Sekirei had similar body styles, with slight differences depending on whom you were talking about. Tsukiumi, weighing in at 256 lbs, was less heavy overall, but had her fat concentrated in many of the same areas as Musubi. Kazehana, weighing in at 270, was more top-heavy, with comically large breasts, fat arms, and a huge stomach that was double-tiered. Matsu was mainly ass-heavy at 301 lbs, but had quite a bit of fat distributed to her face and belly.

Tsukiumi had to sigh. Certainly, they’d all let themselves go, to ridiculous extents, really. But then again, her friends in this room weren’t the only ones affected by all the weight gain. There was also a certain other person, who she realized had just appeared in the doorway with her own titanic form.

“Hello, everyone, I see you’re all enjoying some good food, hm?” Miya Asama said, her jowls and huge gut jiggling as she laughed. “I can hardly blame you, Minato’s cooking is simply to die for nowadays, I must say!”

Everyone looked over to the traditionally-garbed Japanese woman, still amazed at just how huge she had become. Weighing in at 448 lbs., she was officially the fattest woman in the entire building. Musubi may have been the biggest of Minato’s Winged Sekirei, but Miya still beat her for heaviest lady in around (if only barely). And much like Musubi, even though the landlord had a huge, round gut that could knock over unlucky passerby, an ass that could carry small objects, and a very evenly-distributed amount of fat in general, she had taken a somewhat playful approach to it all.

It was a little odd to describe, but both seemed to not mind, and even enjoy in some ways, their massive gains. If one payed attention, there were many times when Musubi would be lazing around, giving her large stomach a rub and letting out incredibly loud belches without abandon, and there were other times when Miya would even jiggle her stomach playfully and purposefully use it in odd ways, such as closing doors or pushing obstructive obstacles out of her path. It was quite odd, if Tsukiumi would say so herself. She had come to resent her own fat quite immensely, so seeing these other attitudes to it just struck her as bizarre.

“I wonder what anyone thinks dinner tonight will be, actually?” Miya said, placing a hand upon her rotund middle. “I hope cheese fries are part of the menu again! Those are one of my favorite dishes of Minato’s.”

Just then, a new presence made themself known in the room…
15533222212112121.title: Sizable Sekirei

choices: Uzume tells Tsukiumi it's okay to lighten up: being fat has its advanatages!
Musubi decides to cheer the sour Sekirei up.
Someone else decides to say something.
155332222121121211.content:
“Hey there, everybody!” Uzume greeted cheerily, waving her hand with a big grin stretching across her face… her much fuller face, to say the least.

The obese, 389 lb. Sekirei was standing in the doorway, every curve and roll of her fat body clearly visible to all present. Just like everyone else, she hadn’t been exempt from the fattening effects of Minato’s cooking, as her massive body attested towards. Looking at her now, anyone that hadn’t known her while she was thin would be forgiven for thinking this young woman had never experienced a day in her life when she could see her toes past the giant collection of adipose that was her gut.

Speaking of, the brunette’s middle was easily the most noticeable aspect of her, a giant sphere that jiggled and wobbled with even slight movements. Uzume had long since began to make sure the hem of her pants was tucked underneath it, letting her spare tire stomach have plenty of room and not cut into the already-stretched fabric. It was met up with the love handles that were extremely prevalent on her sides, which met with the plentiful amount of back fat rolls she possessed now.

Uzume’s chest was always impressive, something that most people would have to stop twice to look at in the past, but now, it was more like you’d have to look thrice in order to comprehend just how bountiful it was nowadays. Each tit was twice the size of a cantaloupe, the supple flesh just barely constrained by the increasingly ill-fitting bra the Sekirei was currently wearing. Said bra was also pushing against her shirt, taking up even more precious real estate of her strained shirt. Thankfully, her chest had remained respectfully perky by this point, although gravity was certainly starting to take a hold, which did annoy the brunette at times.

When it came to her ass and legs, those were only really outdone by Musubi and Miya in regards to their thickness and plush feel. Her posterior used to be perfectly toned and fit, something that would catch the eye of any lucky man that happened to pass by. Now, it was huge and jiggly, attracting the same types of stares, but nowadays from somewhat different people. It had taken on a jello-like consistency, wobbling and pressing against the fabric of her pants as much as possible, with her legs joining in to make the overall constitution of the fabric get just below the point of tearing.

In terms of her face, Uzume hadn’t seen too much of a gain there, but it still showed. She now had a somewhat-pronounced double chin, although it got really visible whenever she craned her head downwards. Her cheeks were also much fuller than previously, complementing the rounding-out that her face underwent in general.

“Did I hear you guys talking about Mianto’s latest culinary feats?” Uzume asked jovially, entering the room with her huge belly and breasts jiggling in tandem with her steps. “It’s a little early, but I’m definitely not the type of girl to say no to some free food!”

And thou has only been showing less and less restraint, Tsukiumi thought to herself. Not that I've been much better...

“Why yes, we were just mentioning Minato just now,” Miya said with a serene smile. “Although, he hasn’t prepared any meals yet.”

“But I can tell you right now, they’re going to be fantastic!” Musubi pitched in, stars in her eyes.

“Of course! He hasn’t failed us yet, has he?” Uzume said with a laugh that caused ripples to form over the expanse of her lardy body. “It’d really suck if he screwed up that streak he’s got going now.”

“Hmph! I wouldn’t mind if my husband’s cooking took a hit every once in a while,” Tsukiumi stated dejectedly as she looked at her own obese form. “My figure hast lost its fitness and strength…”

The room took on an awkward silence: Tsukiumi was in one of her fat-hating moods again. All the girls had gone through this phase at some point or another, but most had been able to work out of it. But since the blonde hadn't made any progress at all, even after all this time, it was obvious something had to be said to ease her worries.
155332222121121211.title: Uzume, Gaining with the Rest!

1553322221211212111.content:
“Aw, c’mon, Tsukiumi!” Uzume said, gaining a sudden, playful mood to ease the tension. “Don’t get so down in the dumps over something like a little weight gain.”

“What?! A l-little?! Art thou daft?” Tsukiumi asked in bewilderment. “My weight gain isn’t a pittance! I hath let myself indulge in the sin of gluttony for far too long, and my fighting abilities, not to mention my overall mobility, hath suffered thanks to this!”

To emphasize her point, the blonde Sekirei placed both her hands on her rotund gut, giving it a few shakes. The motion sent large ripples through its expanse, and it took a couple seconds for it to stop bouncing after the “demonstration” of sorts was done. If one looked closely, they’d be able to see that Tsukiumi’s fingers were a couple inches deep in all the flesh, just barely meeting actual resistance to keep them from going further.

Tsukiumi’s fat may take up even more volume in her body than I initially thought… Matsu mused, adjusting her glasses.

“And I’m just saying you’re making an ocean out of a puddle,” the brunette said, making a shooing motion with her hand. “It’s actually not bad at all, at least to me.”

This caused the Water Sekirei to raise an eyebrow inquisitively. “Oh? And how’s that?”

“Eh he heh! Well, it may sound a little weird…” Uzume placed her hands on her own belly, beginning to rub them over the underside that was poking out of her too-small shirt. “It’s just kind of… fun, don’t you think? I mean, being so big and soft, it’s empowering, in a way.”

With this, she made a small jump, causing her entire frame to start jiggling profusely.

“And I’ve gotten so huge, I’ve broken chairs, knocked stuff over with my belly and butt, popped buttons on at least four different pairs of pants, and I’ve gotten this way by stuffing my face with some of the best food imaginable! All of Minato’s fries, cakes, fudge, pizza… I’ve still got all my Sekirei abilities, but have you ever tried doing a belly bounce? It’s insane!”

“Oooh yeah, you’re right, Uzume!” Musubi said giddily. “It is quite fun! But I don’t think Tsukiumi knows what that is.”

Seeing Uzume continue to gush on about her obesity was certainly a strange experience for Tsukiumi. Just to make sure her ears weren’t deceiving her, she decided to humor the other woman for now.

“B-belly bounce? What is that?”

Uzume gave her a wink with a mischievous smile. “Hee hee, I’ll show you!”

She made her way over to a nearby couch in the foyer, and, making sure everyone was watching, inhaled and then forcefully pushed her stomach out. The chair moved several inches from the impact, sliding across the floor (but thankfully not making any scratch marks). Uzume placed her hands on her gut once more.

“That’s a belly bounce! Seriously, could you even imagine doing that with a flat stomach? It’s impossible!”

“And why wouldst thou ever desire to do that?! ‘Tis disgusting!”

“'Cause it's fun. And for the second, I dunno, I guess I’m just an experimental girl,” the brunette said, shrugging. “I can eat whatever I want, whenever I want, and I’ve got this really interesting set of changes that come along with it! Don’t you think it’s pretty liberating?”

“No, I don’t!” the Water Sekirei near-shouted.

"Oh my," Kazehana said, placing a hand on one of her puffy cheeks. "Who knew a conversation like this would come up in a place like Maison Izumo?"

“Hey there, everyone!” Minato said as he walked into the room, breaking the heated mood. Noticing the fuming blonde in front of him, the young man rubbed the back of his head sheepishly. “Uh, did I miss something?”

Tsukiumi sighed, her nerves calming just a bit. “…No, ‘tis nothing. A minor incursion, ‘twas all.”

“Alright, whatever you say,” Minato said uncertainly. He had a feeling it was something more than just “minor”, but decided to leave it alone for now.

Instead, he, as per usual nowadays, took note of the expanded forms of all of his best friends. It was… surreal, to say the least. When he first met all of them, they were quite thin. Curvy, yes, but none of their BMI’s ever even approached the level of “overweight”. The Ashikabi knew that it was because of his cooking that their figures had ballooned so much, but they loved it so much he didn’t have the heart to stop. Sure, he tried in the beginning to add a few more healthy foods into their diets, like some chopped apples or garden salads, but he was usually politely requested to substitute those dishes with much more fattening ones, like burgers or spaghetti.

The oddness of the whole situation wasn’t helped one bit either by the strange emotions that had been building up within Minato for a while now. He couldn’t put a finger on what they were; not exactly, at any rate. All he knew was that, as his friends started and continued to get bigger and bigger, he didn’t feel any disgust towards them at all. In fact, the exact opposite seemed to be occurring: he couldn’t get his eyes off them!

As the Sekireis’ bodies continued to accumulate more and more adipose, the swaying of their bellies, jiggling of their legs and thighs, bouncing of their breasts… every aspect of them seemed to draw him in even more effectively than before. Seeing everyone lounging around after a hearty meal, letting out the occasional belch as they rubbed their engorged, stomachs, seeing a stray button or two fly down to the ground… Minato had no idea why, but it made him want to see more.

Damn, who knew I was this type of pervert? Minato asked himself rhetorically. I mean, it’s not like I’d ever even be able to vocalize all this stuff. They’d probably think I’m a freak, feeling this way about their figures. I mean, yeah, they seem confident about it all, but aren’t most guys supposed to love thin girls? So then why don’t I fit that mould?

“Hey, Minato!” a voice called out to him.

“Huh?” The Ashikaba jerked his head up, realizing he had sort of zoned out there. “Oh, hey there-”
1553322221211212111.title: A Different Outlook

choices: "What do you think of my new...figure?"
What do you think of Musubi?"
15533222212112121112.content:
"Oh, hey there, Uzume!" Minato said, smiling genuinely. "What's up?"

Uzume smiled at him with one of her signature happy faces, albeit much more cherubic in appearance now than it had ever been while she was still thin (the extra fat collected around her cheeks could be thanked for that). It almost made Minato's heart come to a stop- it was so innocent in nature, enough to practically give Musubi a run for her money. Minato knew it was obvious: there was something inherently different with Uzume now, but he couldn't figure it out for the life of him.

"I was just wondering, Minato..." Uzume said, placing a finger on her chin, "Wanna come...outside with me?"

"Oh! Yeah, sure," the Ashikabi hastily stated, a blush coming to his face. "I…don’t see why not."

Uzume looked at him for a moment, seemingly in contemplation, before another smile appeared on her visage.

"Great! Then what're we waiting for?"

She promptly turned around, somewhat briskly for someone of her girth. Minato's eyes were immediately drawn to her voluminous backside and titanic stomach. They jiggled profusely with even just that movement, like oceans of jell-o that took a few seconds to calm down after the slightest prod. And even as his eyes trailed her as she walked, the young man could see practically every part of Uzume's body jiggle like crazy. One would be forgiven for thinking the Sekirei had been fat all her life, considering the complete lack of tone on display.

Realizing that his ogling Uzume meant he was falling behind, Minato decided to get a move-on. It certainly wasn't hard to catch up; he had remained lithe, compared to nearly everyone else in the household. Considering the Veiled Sekirei's heavier form didn't afford her the luxury of swiftness that she was previously known for, even the average human was able to keep pace with her even during times when she tried to moderately exert herself. The enhanced abilities of the Sekirei could only help them so much, after all.

Minato and Uzume made their way through Maison Izumo with very little idle chit-chat. It didn't take them long to make it to the porch, but as Minato came to a stop, Uzume turned around and gave him a cocky smile.

"What, tired or something?" she said teasingly, leaning towards the Ashikabi. As she did so, the naive nice guy was given a clear view of her monstrous tits and spherical stomach. “I thought you were made of sterner stuff!"

"I-I am!" Minato stuttered out. "I just thought, you know, this is outside, right? So, what was it you had to say?"

Uzume's eyes widened for a moment, but she immediately recovered. Unfortunately, the way she did so was by standing up straight as she began to chuckle, which graduated to a full-on laugh. The vibrations began through her larynx, but then spilled down into the rest of her obese form. Her tits, barely contained within her bra, began bouncing on top of her equally jiggly stomach. The reserves of fat just wobbled with such intensity, Minato was certain Uzume's stomach alone was about a foot and a half thick of pure fat. Her absolutely creamy stomach, the one that used to be washboard thin before the Veiled Sekirei started stuffing her face with all of Minato’s fattening cooking. First it was just a thin layer of pudge, but then it just grew, and grew. First one pair of pants lost its button, then the next, and the next one after that, until the brunette’s closet was absolutely chocked full of ruined pants with parted seams and empty button holes. Now, her stomach was just a vast testament to carbs, binge-eating, and stretch marks. Minato also just now took notice of how poor a fit her shirt was; it couldn't cover her entire stomach, leaving all the area underneath her navel completely exposed to the elements. And any wandering hands...

Shaking himself out of his fixation to prevent any embarrassing drooling and hopefully cleanse his mind, Minato looked back up to the visage of his friend, which was also getting in on the action. Uzume’s plentiful jowls were shaking furiously, her cheeks glowing red as she tried to calm down. Thankfully, the rest of her body followed suit, albeit with a few more seconds of residual joggling.

"Man, I am so bad at phrasing things, huh?" she said, taking a deep breath and giving a catty wink. "Sorry, I kinda thought it'd be a little awkward to say with everyone else there, but I was wondering...wanna come over to the bathhouse?"

Minato's heart practically skipped a beat. The bathhouse? Why did Uzume want him to go there, so out of the blue? A million thoughts went through the Ashikabi's head, but the sound of footsteps pried him back to reality. Re-focusing his attention, he realized that Uzume was walking away again, right in the direction of the location she had suggested.

"Well? Wanna come?" she said, turning her head to look over one of her meaty shoulders.

"Yeah, s-sure!" Minato responded, keeping pace with her again.

Still, he didn't try to break the ice afterwords. Quite frankly, he was busy trying to get a grasp on his flaring emotions from just seeing his friend walk, let alone try and come up with any advanced thoughts. Uzume, on the other hand, from the times the young man could get glimpses of cherubic face, seemed to be in the midst of still more pensive thought.

What could she want to talk with me about? the Ashikabi mused. Is it...about my cooking, or something?

Ever since Minato had begun preparing dishes for his new home, food became the major source of conversation half the time. If it wasn't someone like Musubi asking what was for dinner that night (or the next week), it was Kazehana cooing about how full she was, Tsukiumi complaining about the calorie count of the latest dish, Miya thanking him for handling the task and giving her more free time, etc. The Ashikabi thought at times he even might have caught some of his friends fondling their full bellies after particularly heavy meals, but he was pretty sure that was just his imagination.

Regardless, it seemed like his culinary skills had sparked a bit of an interest in his friends. Cooking magazines would sometimes be lying on a table here and there, cooking books were bought from the store, stuff like that. And anytime Minato looked inside, it always seemed as though one of the dishes he spotted was picked as one of the requests of the night.

Who knew, maybe Uzume was thinking of requesting some huge dish?...And Minato mentally slapped himself for coming to such a stupid conclusion. No one had the type of aura that surrounded the Veiled Sekirei now over food. Whatever she was going to ask him, it was definitely something important.

The duo made it to the doors of the bathhouse, Minato puffing out a sigh of nervousness. If he was right about this being about something important, well, it wasn't as though Uzume generally asked him of this stuff. Of course, he was sure she trusted him, but it was still a bit more of an event than he was used to. And considering half the stuff the Ashikabi encountered in his life, that was saying something.

Off to his side, though, Minato heard a huff come out of his friend. Thinking it a sign of nervousness not unlike what he was going through, he looked over to console Uzume when he noticed something...

Wait, did she...break a sweat? Minato thought dumbly. Is she tired?

Indeed, from what could be judged in the light emanating out of the bathhouse, Uzume's face had gotten quite red, and shallow breaths were escaping from her lips. She even subconsciously raised one of her flabby arms and brought it to her stomach, rubbing the spherical deposit of fat a bit to presumably soothe it after the short walk. Minato honestly couldn't believe it. Someone like her, getting tired just from making her way this distance? Sure, her BMI may have shot through the roof, but considering her prior athleticism?

It took all of Minato’s willpower to keep himself from staring. Uzume was certainly…open about her weight, but he didn’t want to push his luck and make her feel uncomfortable, or anything. After all, he was a gentleman at heart. And what type of gentleman unabashedly ogled women?

So, *huff* we’re here,” Uzume said chipperly, making her way forward. “Right at Maison Izumo’s number one feature, in my book!”

“Yeah, you said it.” Minato nodded. “I swear, does this place ever run out of warm water?”

“Heh, beats me. Not like Miss Miya’s cheap, so I bet she invests the big bucks into this place!” Uzume placed a hand on the front door, and didn’t say anything for a few more seconds. Then… “Hey, Minato…”
15533222212112121112.title: Late-Night Obervations

choices: "Do you want to come with me into the bathhouse for a bit?"
"Think you could help Tsukiumi out with her weight woes?"
Before Uzume says anything, someone interrupts the conversation.
155332222121121211121.content:
"...Huh?" Minato could only ask dumbly, eyes going wide. "Umm, I..."

Where was this coming from? Was Uzume trying to imply what Minato was thinking she was? A sigh escaping his friend's lips caught Minato's attention.

"I guess it's sort of a weird question for me to ask, huh?" she said with a smirk, turning her large body around and smiling, her cheeks dimpling from the act. "I mean, it's not every day you hear that question from a girl, huh? It's just...well, I know what I think of all this-"

Uzume placed both hands on the collection of fat that was her stomach, giving it a hearty shake. Minato couldn't help but get mesmerized at just how jiggly it was; and with the rest of Uzume's body shaking ever-so-subtly from the act, it only helped to emphasize just how much she had let herself go. It really was like looking at the difference between night and day, if one were to look at a picture of Uzume from before Minato's cooking entered her life, and her now, they'd probably have to take a moment to process the radical change.

"-but I wanted to know what you thought of it. I mean, I get that I'm not the type of girl you met before, in the sense that I don't have that supermodel caliber body, but I dunno...just be honest, okay? What do you think?"

Minato steeled himself: he knew he had to be honest. While Uzume was a very collected and confident person, she was still a person, and not conveying his thoughts properly could definitely hurt her. What type of man would he be if he didn't follow his heart?

"I gotta admit, that question definitely wasn't the type I was prepared for," Minato said with a sheepish grin as he scratched the back of his head. "But, I-I actually think you look beautiful, Uzume. Like, really beautiful! More than you can even imagine!"

Uzume stared at him, a bit wide-eyed, but remained quiet to let him continue.

"Yeah, you don't have the same figure you did when we first met, but honestly, I think you're beautiful no matter what! That includes the here and now!" Minato said, giving a mighty grin, before a sheepish expression overcame his visage. "And, uh, if I'll be even more honest...I actually think the weight you gained hasn't been anything but an improvement. You're such a kind person, Uzume, and your body reflects that. Seeing someone like you, who takes life by its reigns and tries to live it your own way, to the fullest, is always so inspiring. It's helped me win tons of battles up until this point, with the help of you, and everyone else."

Minato's eyes gained a fire as he continued on, seemingly unstoppable in his opinions.

"And with your expanding body, it just makes me know that you've been enjoying your time with us. It's not just my cooking, you've really opened up to me, Musubi, Tsukiumi, everyone! It feels like we're a happy family, you know? You've relaxed, and are enjoying the simple things in life. And, well, this is going to sound a lot less romantic, but...I just can't help but find you just letting go and getting fat...hot."

Minato eyed his friend's stomach as he continued on, letting his emotions practically flow out.

"Your stomach just...is so unrestrained, I guess is the best way to put it. It's really just...it's insanely hot how your clothes just look constantly on the verge of tearing, you have a hard time fitting in chairs, every movement you make seems to make every part of your body jiggle like crazy...even now, your shirt's been riding up your stomach this whole time. Seriously, you have the body of a goddess, Uzume!"

Minato finally finished, trying to catch his breath by the end of that love-addled rant. He really didn't know how that looked, quite frankly. Had he been too forward? Did he phrase things properly? But upon looking at Uzume's face once more, he saw her practically on the verge of tears.

"Oh, Minato!" she cried, rushing forward and pulling the Japanese man into an embrace, "Thank you!"

The Ashikabi was pressed against her massive stomach and tits, his face practically buried in their great expanse. This was the first time Minato had actually been able to feel just how soft the Veiled Sekirei had become, and it was not a disappointing experience. Her stomach especially was incredibly malleable, easily making way to envelop the front half of his lithe form, and her chest did the rest with his head. There was just so much, he felt that he'd experience sensory overload if it continued for much longer.

Thankfully, Uzume pulled him back a bit as she looked into his eyes a tangible feeling of relief exuding forth.

"That really means a lot to me, you know that?" she said, a smile easily making itself known, before her face turned scarlet. "Actually, Minato, there was a reason I asked you that, beyond just confirming whether or not I was, you know, disgusting or something."
155332222121121211121.title: The Honesty Policy

choices: Cut to Minato's Mother, Sahashi, who's even larger than Yukari.
1553322221211212111211.content:
“Ah! Wh-where’s this coming from, all of a sudden?” Minato asked, flustered. “I mean, it’s not like I’d…well, I’d really like it, but…what do you need someone like me for? Being a guy and all, is it really my place to go into the womens’ bath?”

“I know it’s risqué, Minato, but I really do need your help for something!” Uzume said earnestly. “You’re the only person who can do this. I’m not putting my trust in you lightly, because if there’s one guy who can keep a secret and lend a helping hand without a second thought, it’s you, riiight?”

The obese Sekirei leaned over towards Minato, giving him a charming wink to emphasize her point. The Ashikabi had to admit, his friendships with these women had taught him that succumbing to feminine wiles was one of his greatest strengths, yet also a major weakness. It was the best way to get him to do even trivial things that were only foisted upon him by others’ laziness (as was a growing aspect of Maison Izumo these past several months, tying into several growing waistlines), and Uzume knew that very well.

“Alright, I guess it couldn’t hurt…as long as Miss Miya doesn’t find out,” Minato amended quickly.

“Of course! As long as we don't let any of this leak out, we should be fine!”

Without further ado, the two walked in. Uzume lead the way, giving Minato a very nice view of her plentiful back rolls showing through her shirt and humungous ass. He averted his eyes, the idea of staring at his friend in a lustful fashion making him thoroughly uncomfortable, despite his earlier confession.

“Alright, wanna change in here with me, or in the bath itself?” Uzume said suddenly as they got into the rest bench area right before the bath itself. “I won’t mind either way.”

Minato realized exactly what she was implying, and his face immediately flushed. Shaking his head fervently, the young man tried to remain as big a gentleman as possible.

“I-I’ll do it in the bath, thanks,” he said as he hurried inside. “Won’t take long!”

Several moments later, Minato was naked and sitting in the recently-filled tub, not quite knowing how he had gotten to this point and what to expect. The sound of the door opening interrupted his thoughts, however, and looking up, he had to scramble to cover his nose. For now, he was looking at the Veiled Sekirei in the nude, something his senses had never processed before.

While Uzume’s figure had never been truly hidden before, due to the nature of her clothes and how tightly they clung onto every role and fold, it was still something else to actually see her without any obstruction. As she walked over towards him, a decidedly sultry look in her eyes, it was easily apparent just how many jiggles the simple act of walking could cause for her. Her legs, formerly hidden by her long pants, displayed no form of tone as they chaffed against one another, the jiggles extending all the way up to Uzume’s thighs. Her stomach, with its noticeable hang, was also a center of massive amounts of jostling, her rolls flopping this way and that as she carried out the laborious process of movement. And one couldn’t forget her pillowy breasts, which were now free to pool over the vast expanse of pale flab that was Uzume’s stomach without restraint. It was practically a FA’s Heaven.

When she finally got close to Minato, she slowly lowered herself into the warm water, the level noticeably changed as much less volume was made available. She let out a small sigh, stretching her arms up in the air as she made herself comfortable, then lowered them as she made herself more comfortable by leaning back against the basin. Looking over at the Ashikabi next to her, Uzume giggled.

“This is your first time in a bath with a woman, isn’t it?” Pausing a moment, Uzume amended, “Well, at least one who’s not your Mom, I guess.”

“Y-yeah, got that right,” Minato near-mumbled. “It’s…definitely not something I was expecting so soon."

“You expected it to happen at anytime as long as you were in Maison Izumo?” Uzume said playfully. “Weren’t you the one who was afraid of Miss Miya earlier?”

“Who isn’t?”

“…True. We haven’t survived as long as we have by being idiots, that’s for sure.”

Suddenly, Uzume hefted herself off the side of the basin, slowly crawling her way to Minato’s front. Getting herself comfy once more, she looked into Minato’s eyes, a hint of red appearing on her visage.

“So, um…I have a bit of….an embarrassing question to ask you,” the Veiled Sekirei said demurely. “It’s…not something I’d ask of anyone else. Like, really. I wouldn’t be telling you about it, if you hadn’t said what you did earlier.”

Sighing, Uzume seemed to be mentally preparing herself for something. Minato knew he shouldn’t say anything, despite her obvious discomfort; whatever she was thinking, she needed to think in silence for as long as was necessary.

"Can you help me wash myself?!" Uzume practically shouted it out, and slapped both hands over her mouth not a second after. Then, in a much quieter manner, "Since I've gotten fat, it's been a lot harder to wash every part of my body. I mean, the water's done a good enough job, but..."

Silence pervaded the bathhouse for several seconds, neither party knowing exactly what to say after a sentence like that was thrown out there. However, realizing he had to be the one to break the ice, Minato cleared his throat and responded as best he could.
